sentences.sContent: The field of literature has taken on a glory complexion during the socialism era. And it will lead to a diversification in the thinking mode of literature.
sentences.sContent_eng: The field of literature has taken on a glory complexion during the socialism era. And it will lead to a diversification in the thinking mode of literature.
sentences.sCn: 社会主义新时期的文艺园地，呈现出摇曳多姿、竞艳争辉的繁荣局面，这必然引起人们文学观念和思维方式的变化。

sentences.sContent: Experts say the future of space tourism will show a mass, project diversification, companies competition and improve the four major trends in safety regulations.
sentences.sContent_eng: Experts say the future of space tourism will show a mass, project diversification, companies competition and improve the four major trends in safety regulations.
sentences.sCn: 专家说，未来的空间旅游将显示一个大规模，项目多样化，企业竞争和提高安全法规的四大趋势。

sentences.sContent: Exploitation resulted diversification of habitat type which increasing some bird species . however , mangrove and mudflat reducing resulted disappear of some bird species.
sentences.sContent_eng: Exploitation resulted diversification of habitat type which increasing some bird species . however , mangrove and mudflat reducing resulted disappear of some bird species.
sentences.sCn: 生境类型的多样化增加了不少鸟类物种，同时开发与破坏也导致了一些鸟类物种的消失。

phrases.pCn: 多元化经营；经营多角化

words.tran: 不同的；多种多样的；变化多的
使多样化，使变化；增加产品种类以扩大
